text: yefitihini wede semayi megelabet’i be’irigit’i inayaleni፡፡ wedemitiwedatimi k’ibila inazorihaleni፡፡ silezihi fitihini wede tekeberewi mesigidi (wede ka‘iba) agit’ach’a azuri፡፡ yetimi sifira bitihonumi (sitisegidu) fitochachihuni wederisu agit’ach’a azuru፡፡ ineziyami mets’ihafuni yeteset’uti irisu kegetachewi sihoni iwineti mehonuni yawik’alu፡፡ alahimi kemitiseruti sira zenigi ayidelemi፡፡
